chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
R: nat -> nat -> Prop
n: nat

Goal:
(forall i : nat, i < n -> exists y, R i y) -> exists s : nat -> nat, forall i : nat, i < n -> R i (s i)

Premises:
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
fin_reif : forall (X : Type) (R : nat -> X -> Prop) (n : nat), (forall i : nat, i < n -> exists x : X, R i x) -> exists s : forall x : nat, x < n -> X, forall (i : nat) (Hi : i < n), R i (s i Hi)
Fin.to_nat_of_nat : forall h : ?p < ?n, Fin.to_nat (Fin.of_nat_lt h) = exist (fun i : nat => i < ?n) ?p h where ?p : [R : nat -> nat -> Prop n : nat |- nat] ?n : [R : nat -> nat -> Prop n : nat |- nat]
Fin.to_nat = fix to_nat (m : nat) (n : Fin.t m) {struct n} : {i : nat | i < m} := match n in (Fin.t n0) return {i : nat | i < n0} with | @Fin.F1 j => exist (fun i : nat => i < S j) 0 (Nat.lt_0_succ j) | @Fin.FS n0 p => let (i, P) := to_nat n0 p in exist (fun i0 : nat => i0 < S n0) (S i) (lt_n_S i n0 P) end : forall m : nat, Fin.t m -> {i : nat | i < m} Arguments Fin.to_nat {m}%nat_scope
Nat.lt_ind_rel : forall R : Relation_Definitions.relation nat, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq (Morphisms.respectful eq iff)) R -> (forall m : nat, R 0 (S m)) -> (forall n m : nat, n < m -> R n m -> R (S n) (S m)) -> forall n m : nat, n < m -> R n m
lt_wf_double_rect : forall P : nat -> nat -> Type, (forall n m : nat, (forall p q : nat, p < n -> P p q) -> (forall p : nat, p < m -> P n p) -> P n m) -> forall n m : nat, P n m
lt_wf_double_rec : forall P : nat -> nat -> Set, (forall n m : nat, (forall p q : nat, p < n -> P p q) -> (forall p : nat, p < m -> P n p) -> P n m) -> forall n m : nat, P n m
FinFun.bSurjective = fun (n : nat) (f : nat -> nat) => forall y : nat, y < n -> exists x : nat, x < n /\ f x = y : nat -> (nat -> nat) -> Prop Arguments FinFun.bSurjective _%nat_scope _%function_scope
nat_ind : forall P : nat -> Prop, P 0 -> (forall n : nat, P n -> P (S n)) -> forall n : nat, P n
nat_rect : forall P : nat -> Type, P 0 -> (forall n : nat, P n -> P (S n)) -> forall n : nat, P n
Acc_intro : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (x : A), (forall y : A, R y x -> Acc R y) -> Acc R x
Nat.order_induction_0 : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> A 0 -> (forall n : nat, 0 <= n -> A n -> A (S n)) -> (forall n : nat, n < 0 -> A (S n) -> A n) -> forall n : nat, A n
Nat.right_induction : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall z : nat, A z -> (forall n : nat, z <= n -> A n -> A (S n)) -> forall n : nat, z <= n -> A n
Nat.induction : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> A 0 -> (forall n : nat, A n -> A (S n)) -> forall n : nat, A n
Nat.central_induction : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall z : nat, A z -> (forall n : nat, A n <-> A (S n)) -> forall n : nat, A n
VectorDef.nth_order : VectorDef.t ?A ?n -> forall p : nat, p < ?n -> ?A where ?A : [R : nat -> nat -> Prop n : nat |- Type] ?n : [R : nat -> nat -> Prop n : nat |- nat]
le_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : nat -> Prop), P n -> (forall m : nat, n <= m -> P m -> P (S m)) -> forall n0 : nat, n <= n0 -> P n0
lt_wf_rec1 : forall (n : nat) (P : nat -> Set), (forall n0 : nat, (forall m : nat, m < n0 -> P m) -> P n0) -> P n
lt_wf_rec : forall (n : nat) (P : nat -> Set), (forall n0 : nat, (forall m : nat, m < n0 -> P m) -> P n0) -> P n
lt_wf_rect : forall (n : nat) (P : nat -> Type), (forall n0 : nat, (forall m : nat, m < n0 -> P m) -> P n0) -> P n
lt_wf_rect1 : forall (n : nat) (P : nat -> Type), (forall n0 : nat, (forall m : nat, m < n0 -> P m) -> P n0) -> P n
VectorDef.replace_order : VectorDef.t ?A ?n -> forall p : nat, p < ?n -> ?A -> VectorDef.t ?A ?n where ?A : [R : nat -> nat -> Prop n : nat |- Type] ?n : [R : nat -> nat -> Prop n : nat |- nat]
Nat.lt_ind : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall n : nat, A (S n) -> (forall m : nat, n < m -> A m -> A (S m)) -> forall m : nat, n < m -> A m
well_founded_lt_compat : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (R : A -> A -> Prop), (forall x y : A, R x y -> f x < f y) -> well_founded R
Nat.lt_exists_pred : forall z n : nat, z < n -> exists k : nat, n = S k /\ z <= k
FinFun.bFun = fun (n : nat) (f : nat -> nat) => forall x : nat, x < n -> f x < n : nat -> (nat -> nat) -> Prop Arguments FinFun.bFun _%nat_scope _%function_scope

```coq
intros H.
apply fin_reif with (R:=R) (n:=n).
exact H.
Qed.```

original: intros H. apply fin_reif with (R:=R) (n:=n). apply H.
